body: Some tieflings have feet that are more bestial than human. Whether their feet resemble those of a clawed predator or are the cloven hooves common to many of their kind, tieflings with this trait gain a 10-foot racial bonus to their speed when using the charge, run, or withdraw actions. This racial trait replaces skilled.
name: Fiendish Sprinter
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Tieflings/Alternate Racial Traits/Fiendish Sprinter
